about_the_game:
TerranLands is a survival game with a lot of exploration. Play with Daniello, a mushroom boy, in a world of caves and interesting places to discover.

Grab your things and go on an adventure! Outside the Fungmo Kingdom is dangerous and wild! Explore, mine, fight different types of enemies and find new equipment. At the end of the adventure, return to your Home safely and create new weapons, armor and items so that you can explore even more advanced caves.

Features:

  • More than 10 types of Caves to Explore: You can venture through different types of caves, from relaxing caves to more intense and difficult caves. In addition, each cave contains subareas, so even more places for you to explore;

  • Procedurally Generated Caves: This means you'll never explore the same cave twice, every time you go adventuring you'll find a whole new cave, with different rooms, enemies and treasures;

  • Over 1000 Items to Find: Play the way you like to play! Craft a perfect gear set to be a powerful mage, or a set to become a very strong wall. You choose how you want to play;

  • Decorate and Build your Bedroom: While you are not exploring, relax a little and build, decorate and create new equipment in your Bedroom. Make your bedroom look beautiful, the game contains more than 100 decorations for it;

  • Colorful and Cute: The game's Environments and Characters are colorful and cute in animated pixel art, especially Daniello, our very cute explorer boy. Watch out for enemies, they might be cute but they are still dangerous;

  • Story: Finally, find charismatic NPCs and ancient places that will tell you about the story of this world. Something from the past haunts the reigns of Terran.

Help the people of the Fungmo Kingdom and discover the past of the Terran reigns as you explore this huge world. Daniello is extremely eager to explore all these caves.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2.5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: TerranLands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: TerranLands is a survival adventure game. Explore and gather resources in many different caves, build and craft new items in your home, and discover old Terran stories.
